tool_description: Finshorts is a platform where you can access real-time stock quotes, company information, historical price charts, historical dividends, and cash flow statements for various companies.

api_list.name: Historical Prices
api_list.description: Provides real-time historical prices for companies.

required_parameters.name: q
required_parameters.description: The stock symbol of the company.

optional_parameters.name: month
optional_parameters.description: The number of months of historical data to retrieve.

api_list.name: Stock Quote
api_list.description: Provides real-time stock quote data for companies.

required_parameters.name: q
required_parameters.description: The stock symbol of the company.

api_list.name: Cash flow statement
api_list.description: Provides real-time cash flow statements for companies.

required_parameters.name: q
required_parameters.description: The stock symbol of the company.

api_list.name: Historical Dividends
api_list.description: Provides real-time historical dividends data for companies.

required_parameters.name: q
required_parameters.description: The stock symbol of the company.

optional_parameters.name: range_type
optional_parameters.description: The type of range for historical dividends.

optional_parameters.name: range
optional_parameters.description: The number of years of historical dividends to retrieve.

required_parameters.name: q
required_parameters.description: The stock symbol of the company.
